message.content:
Based on the given lineage relationships, a chain of ancestry can be traced from Janice to Isabella. Specifically, Janice is a descendant of Richard, and through a series of relationships involving Frank, Bradley, Victoria, Marie, Logan, Brandon, Jesse, Christina, Charlotte, Timothy, Joshua, Madison, Shirley, Rebecca, Michelle, Aaron, Lawrence, Denise, Sharon, Dorothy, Cynthia, Roger, Nicole, Willie, Kathryn, Samantha, David, Thomas, Lisa, Jacob, Philip, Ashley, Bruce, Russell, Sandra, Emily, Christopher, Teresa, Alexis, Helen, Natalie, Gregory, Frances, Alice, Jonathan, Billy, Eugene, Stephanie, Jeffrey, Carolyn, Ruth, Christine, Brittany, Carol, Amanda, Benjamin, Sophia, Mark, Mary, Terry, Grace, Hannah, Randy, Harold, Joe, Donald, Joseph, Daniel, Nicholas, Roy, Wayne, Linda, Ralph, Arthur, Michael, Kayla, Margaret, Megan, Alexander, Dennis, Matthew, Nathan, Patrick, Beverly, Jose, Cheryl, Kathleen, Alan, Gary, Karen, Martha, Amber, Theresa, Judy, Charles, Elijah, Joan, Barbara, Katherine, Julia, Kevin, John, Austin, Samuel, Gloria, Peter, Doris, Kimberly, Brenda, Keith, Adam, Joyce, Anna, Noah, Elizabeth, Juan, Kelly, Donna, Dylan, Jerry, Maria, Julie, Judith, Jeremy, Diana, Jason, Jacqueline, Walter, Christian, Carl, Melissa, Scott, Raymond, Henry, Ronald, Sarah, Gabriel, Emma, Tyler, Laura, Ann, Vincent, Albert, Anthony, Paul, Steven, Deborah, Danielle, Larry, Gerald, Olivia, Sara, William, Justin, Lori, Betty, Catherine, Andrew, Mason, Bryan, Eric, Jessica, Edward, Zachary, Brian, Jennifer, Kyle, Andrea, Rachel, Evelyn, Sean, Lauren, Ethan, Pamela, Bobby, Stephen, Jordan, Patricia, Diane, Abigail, Jack, Debra, James, Marilyn, Amy, Kenneth, Susan, Heather, Nancy, and finally Isabella.

Since Isabella is an ancestor of Nancy, and Nancy is an ancestor of Heather, and so on through the chain to Janice, Isabella is an ancestor of Janice. Therefore, Janice is Isabella's descendant.

<ANSWER>3</ANSWER>
